name: It's a Wonderful Life
summary: "It's a Wonderful Life" holds a special place in Christmas lore, and its enduring legacy continues to captivate audiences. The film's ability to evoke a range of emotions is evident in its memorable characters and themes. Screen Rant delves into a nuanced examination of a specific villain, highlighting the depth of the film's narrative. The BBC explores the behind-the-scenes story of Frank Capra's masterpiece, shedding light on its journey to becoming a Christmas classic. Hollywood Reporter offers a poignant reflection on the life of Karolyn Grimes, who played Zuzu, and the complexities she faced beyond her iconic role. Guillermo del Toro offers a thought-provoking perspective on the film, interpreting it as a complex portrayal of the "American Dream." Director Frank Capra's biography provides valuable insights into the creation of George Bailey, the film's central character. CBR explores the reasons why "It's a Wonderful Life" remains the quintessential Christmas movie, highlighting its timeless themes and emotional resonance. Yardbarker presents interesting trivia and facts surrounding the film, adding to its rich history and cultural significance. Discover Los Angeles highlights the film's enduring presence in the city, reinforcing its status as a beloved Christmas tradition.

name: Die Hard
summary: Die Hard, the popular action film starring Bruce Willis, has sparked a longstanding debate about whether or not it is considered a Christmas movie. Various news outlets have weighed in on the issue, with some arguing that the film's Christmas setting and themes qualify it as a holiday classic, while others maintain that its violent content and lack of traditional Christmas elements disqualify it. Despite the differing opinions, Die Hard remains a popular choice for viewing during the holiday season, with streaming services offering convenient access to the film. Additionally, the release of new Christmas-themed movies such as "Carry-On" has drawn comparisons to Die Hard's unique blend of action and festive cheer. The debate surrounding Die Hard's holiday status continues to engage fans and critics alike, ensuring its enduring legacy as a subject of spirited discussion.

name: Lakers
summary: Dennis Smith Jr. believes he can contribute to the Lakers' success. Magic Johnson claims trades for DeMar DeRozan and Buddy Hield were nearly completed for the Lakers. The NBA has acknowledged a major officiating error in the Lakers' victory over the Sacramento Kings. The Lakers are reportedly interested in acquiring Bruce Brown and thought they would sign him in 2023. Austin Reaves commends the Lakers' new starting defender for his performance against Ja Morant. In a game recap, the Pistons defeated the Lakers 117-114 on December 23, 2024. A game preview for the Warriors-Lakers matchup on December 25, 2024, is available. Bronny James was called up for the Lakers' game against the Pistons but did not participate. CBS Sports offers information on how to watch the Sacramento Kings vs. Los Angeles Lakers NBA game online, on television, via live stream, and when it starts. LeBron James' performance led the Lakers to their second consecutive road victory against the Kings, as summarized in a recap.

name: Restaurants open on Christmas Eve
summary: In preparation for the upcoming holidays, several news outlets have released articles detailing which restaurants will be open on Christmas Eve and Christmas Day. In Binghamton, New York, several restaurants, including the Lost Dog Cafe and the Colonial, will be serving meals for those who prefer not to cook. Various establishments in the Brockton area of Massachusetts will also be open on Christmas Eve, such as the Brockton House of Pizza and the China King. Several restaurants in Fort Wayne, Indiana, will offer dining options on both Christmas Eve and Christmas Day, including the Skyline Chili and the Parkview North Hospital Cafeteria. Across the country, many restaurants will be open on Christmas Eve 2024, including Chipotle and Chick-fil-A. In Corpus Christi, Texas, several restaurants, such as the Black Diamond Oyster Bar and the Executive Surf Club, will be serving customers on both Christmas Eve and Christmas Day. Chinese restaurants in the Triangle region of North Carolina, including the Hunan Restaurant in Durham and the Szechuan House in Cary, will be open during the holiday season. Metro Detroit will have various dining options available on Christmas Day, such as the Pegasus Taverna in Greektown and the Andiamo Detroit Riverfront. In Hattiesburg, Mississippi, several restaurants will be open, including the Keg & Barrel and the Tabella. For those seeking holiday dining options in Eugene, Oregon, 11 restaurants will be open on Christmas Day, including the Excelsior Cafe and the King Estate Winery Tasting Room & Restaurant. Additionally, it is important to note that some stores and restaurants may have altered holiday hours, so it is advised to contact the establishment directly or check their website for specific information.

name: White Christmas
summary: With the holiday season approaching, many are eager to experience a white Christmas. According to news reports, the likelihood of snow on December 25th varies depending on geographic location. In some regions of the United States, such as the Northeast and Midwest, forecasters predict a "white Christmas" due to winter weather alerts and snowfall in mountain areas. However, most of the country is expected to remain dry. Specific cities and states have also been analyzing their historical data to determine the last time they experienced a white Christmas and the chances of it happening again this year. Overall, the possibility of a white Christmas is dependent on local weather conditions and snowfall forecasts.

name: Sophie Hediger
summary: Swiss snowboarder Sophie Hediger has tragically died at the age of 26 following an avalanche in Switzerland. The Olympic snowboarder was pronounced dead shortly after being extricated from an avalanche that occurred during a backcountry snowboarding session with a group of friends. The incident has sent shockwaves through the snowboarding community and beyond, with tributes pouring in for the young athlete. Many have expressed their condolences and remembered Hediger for her passion, talent, and positive spirit.

name: San Jose State Football
summary: The 2024 Hawaii Bowl will feature a matchup between the San Jose State Spartans and the South Florida Bulls. No. 1 college football expert from CBS Sports predicts a victory for San Jose State. The American Athletic Conference previews the matchup as a Christmas Eve showdown. USA TODAY will provide live updates, scores, and highlights from the game. College Football Network analyzes the impact of Nick Nash's absence on San Jose State's chances. FOX Sports offers predictions, odds, and picks for the contest. Sports Illustrated provides a game day guide with information on how to watch and stream the game. name: Restaurants open Christmas Day
summary: As Christmas Day 2024 approaches, several news outlets have compiled lists of restaurants that will be open to serve customers on the holiday. In Jackson, Mississippi, a list from the Clarion Ledger provides information on local eateries that will be accessible. Similarly, the Hattiesburg American has curated a list of open restaurants in Hattiesburg, Mississippi. Houston residents can refer to CultureMap Houston's compilation of over 20 dining establishments that will be operating on Christmas Day. In northwest Florida, The Northwest Florida Daily News has compiled a list of restaurants in Okaloosa County that will be open. The Detroit Free Press offers a comprehensive guide to 18 restaurants in the metro Detroit area that will be available on the holiday. USA TODAY provides details on popular eateries like Chipotle, Chick-fil-A, and Wendy's that will be open on Christmas Day. The Caller Times lists restaurants in Corpus Christi, Texas, that will be serving on Christmas Eve and Christmas Day. The Eugene Register-Guard identifies 11 Eugene, Oregon, restaurants that will be open on Christmas Day. The Commercial Appeal provides a list of fast-food places and restaurants in Memphis, Tennessee, that will be operating. Finally, NBC San Diego features Chinese restaurants in San Diego that will be open during the holidays, highlighting the personal stories of owners who have worked on Christmas for many years.

name: Chevy Chase
summary: Several news articles discuss the contentious relationship between director Chris Columbus and actor Chevy Chase during the production of the holiday classic "National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation." Columbus, known as the "King of Christmas Movies," has opened up about his frustrations working with Chase, describing him as unprofessional, disrespectful, and allegedly treating the director poorly. The rift between them reportedly led Columbus to quit the project, with others corroborating his account of Chase's challenging behavior on set. These articles highlight the behind-the-scenes drama and challenges that can arise during filmmaking.

name: A Christmas Carol
summary: With its timeless themes and heartwarming story, "A Christmas Carol" continues to captivate audiences, as evidenced by the numerous versions available in 2024. Whether seeking a classic interpretation or a modernized adaptation, viewers have various options to enjoy this beloved tale. The enduring appeal of "A Christmas Carol" stems from its exploration of redemption, memory, and the pagan spirit of Christmas. Critics praise the haunting yet inspiring moment when Scrooge encounters the Ghost of Christmas Present, reinforcing the story's universal appeal. With its enduring power, "A Christmas Carol" remains a beacon of hope and a reminder of the transformative power of the holiday season. Additionally, the article mentions the existence of four lesser-known "Christmas Carols" written by Charles Dickens, highlighting their historical significance.

name: Mashed potatoes recipe
summary: Numerous sources have shared their takes on creating exceptional mashed potatoes. Notable mentions include The New York Times with their recipe breaking culinary norms, NPR offering a flavorful holiday twist, and Better Homes & Gardens presenting a crowd-pleasing "Million Dollar" version. Business Insider highlights Ina Garten's exceptional potato dishes, while Yahoo Life shares their favorite 2024 dinner recipe, promising regular inclusion in weekly menus. MSN compiles a comprehensive ranking of 32 mashed potato recipes. Addressing practical concerns, Better Homes & Gardens provides guidance on freezing leftover mashed potatoes. Celebrity chef Lidia Bastianich offers a delightful combination of roast lamb and smashed potatoes, and Betches shares festive holiday recipes. Finally, The Mirror features the insights of a Michelin-starred chef who cautions against a common cooking error that can compromise the quality of mashed potatoes.

name: NORAD Santa Tracker
summary: For nearly seven decades, NORAD's Santa Tracker has been a beloved Christmas tradition, capturing the imaginations of children worldwide. Originating from a misdialed number in 1955, the tracker has evolved into a sophisticated system that now attracts millions of kids eager to follow Santa's journey on Christmas Eve. From the initial morale boost it provided during the Cold War to its enduring popularity today, the tracker has a captivating history and continues to bring joy to those who believe in the magic of Christmas.
